label: ball
caption: A young athlete in a blue jersey, number 13 emblazoned on his back, takes a run-up to kick the ball during a local soccer match. His teammate and friend watches intently from the sidelines, offering words of encouragement as the player prepares for what he hopes will be a game-changing shot. The stadium's lush green grass stretches out behind them, with a few scattered fans cheering on their team.
